title: Wembley Stadium food to feature CO2 labels during UEFA Champions League Final
body_text:
Menu boards at Wembley Stadium and all 'Champions Festival' food trucks to display carbon footprint of food and drink during European club football showpiece
Carbon labels are to be displayed on food and drink served at Wembley Stadium during the 2024 UEFA Champions League Final in London this weekend, in an effort to help tens of thousands of football fans...
